channel.title: Server help
channel.description: ok well i opened my testscape adn i opened runserver. i got a black screen that said starting testscape server. what do i have to do? plz help ty =)

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

If u have moparscape client. open it and log in with any username and pass with the ip 127.0.0.1. Then u will be in ur server but other ppl cant get in unless u do the router port forwarding or use hamachi. In hamachi go to new network make a network advertoise the network name and pass and whoever wants to join will join and will be able to acces the server with UR ip not (127.0.0.1) ur ip will be beside ur name in hamachi(other members can see it and u can see other members)

Glad to help!
Good luck!

Read full topic
